conversations.conversation: I am a nice simple and lovely lady you will love to meet, a kind hearted girl, love to meet people ,I love to have fun when i am less busy and love to travel all over the world. I am a graduate and i work. i am brought up in a well trained, and decent home. I am here looking for a nice and lovely sincere man to spend the rest of my life with, if you feel you are up to the task, then lets give it a try and see what comes out of it. cheers
